mapper.select: SELECT * FROM minute_quote WHERE date=#{date, typeHandler=com.trade.common.infrastructure.util.mybatis.LocalDateTypeHandler} LIMIT 1000000000
SELECT stockID, time FROM minute_quote WHERE date=#{date, typeHandler=com.trade.common.infrastructure.util.mybatis.LocalDateTypeHandler} LIMIT 1000000000
SELECT * FROM minute_quote WHERE stockID=#{stockID} AND date=#{date, typeHandler=com.trade.common.infrastructure.util.mybatis.LocalDateTypeHandler} LIMIT 1000
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO minute_quote ( stockID, date, time, price, volume, turnover, changeRate ) VALUES ( #{stockID}, #{date, typeHandler=com.trade.common.infrastructure.util.mybatis.LocalDateTypeHandler}, #{time, typeHandler=com.trade.common.infrastructure.util.mybatis.LocalTimeTypeHandler}, #{price}, #{volume}, #{turnover}, #{changeRate} )
